text: @TeamPelosi You are exactly right #MadamSpeaker this administration only cares about 1 thing only and that's how the stock markets are doing instead of putting the kids 1st when it comes to the Coronavirus and we don't need a POTUS like that by no means at all and it's sad that we have Trump
